svg.script: function waitUntilFontLoaded() { var canvas = document.createElementNS("http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml", "canvas"); canvas.width = 100; canvas.height = 100; var ctx = canvas.getContext("2d"); ctx.font = "100px Ahem"; ctx.fillText("_", 0, 100); var img = ctx.getImageData(50, 50, 1, 1); if (img.data[3] == 255) { setTimeout(function() { document.documentElement.removeAttribute("class"); }, 1); } else { setTimeout(waitUntilFontLoaded, 200); } } setTimeout(waitUntilFontLoaded, 200);
